trans_examp.trans_en: a thick piece of tree trunk or branch, especially one cut for burning on a fire

dsense.name: log
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a full written record of a journey, a period of time, or an event
trans_examp.trans_cn: （旅程、某段时间或事件的）日记，日志

name: log
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: log
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to cut down trees so that you can use their wood

example.eg: The forest has been so heavily logged that it is in danger of disappearing.
example.egtrans: 这片森林被过度砍伐，面临消失的危险。

dsense.name: log
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The Better Business Bureau has logged more than 90 complaints.
example.egtrans: 商务改进局已经记录下了90多条投诉。

trans_examp.trans_en: to travel and record a particular distance
